rule.name: CASE_APP_fetchRecord
rule.description:
Fetches a single record instance (as a Dictionary). If primaryKeyField is null, defaults to "id". Primary key must be an integer.
If creating a process backed record, create a process variable called "processId" to store the pp!id value and use as a primary key
record: a record type value, likely from a Constant of type Record Type primaryKeyField: the name of the field that has the @Id annotation in the entityType. If null, defaults to "id". primaryKeyValue: the integer primary key value to select.
